attributes.action: Bring the National Service starting age from 16 years back in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Teenagers need to understand the quality and importance of discipline.  Placing them in prison do not deter their behaviour and the prisons are over filled as it is.  Send them into National Service to aquire respect, discipline and understanding of responsibility to their fellow citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
